type.name: Alch

property.name: Description
property.summary: Gets or sets the description of this Potion that will override the enchantment description if provided.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: Effects
property.summary: Gets or sets the contaning Effects of this Potion.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: FullName
property.summary: Gets or sets the in-game name of this Potion.

property.name: Keywords
property.summary: Gets or sets the containing Keywords associated with this Potion.

property.name: ObjectBounds
property.summary: Gets or sets the of this Potion.

property.name: PickUpSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Potion is picked up.

property.name: PutDownSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Potion is put down.

property.name: Type
property.summary: Gets or sets the type of this Potion.

property.name: UseSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Potion is used.

property.name: Value
property.summary: Gets or sets the value of this Potion.

property.name: Weight
property.summary: Gets or sets the weight of this Potion.

property.name: WorldModel
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the world model (.nif file) that will be used for this Potion.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.

type.remarks: Potion forms include drinks and food as well.
